comment: When someone talks about vaccination, or 'anti-vaxxers', all I hear is... "I'm from the government, and I'm here to help." I'm not anti-vax, per se. However, if you keep me ignorant wrt the potential side effects of vaccines, you're not helping me ... at all. "I'm a doctor! Trust me!" simply isn't good enough.
